short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate business days since the selected date

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
(BETA)
Calculating how many business days have passed since a certain date is a function that many of us need to do repeatedly.

Business time is a simple tool that will do this for you.

Just select the text of any date in your browser and click "Business days since [selected text]" to get the difference. An alert will pop up and tell you how many business days have passed since that date.

Most standard date formats should work, such as "Mar 18, 2017", "3/18/2017", etc.

Additional features may be added in the future, such as adding holidays, a keyboard shortcut, smarter date inferencing, and more.

This is a free app that was provided to make things easier for many of us. 
You can contribute to this project at http://cash.me/$mrgnw
